comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5800?focusedCommentId=16933804) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Docker R tests are available, running nightly and on demand via `@ursabot crossbow submit docker-r`. 

I wouldn't replace the Travis job with this, though: it's about 3x slower (20 mins vs. >1 hour).
